name: Bopeez (New Song!)
description:
Go on an adventure of beats!

Fight various enemies with beats and raps!

(this is an fnf ripoff/fan game) How To Mod:  Charting: Go to the backdrop sprite and use the Clone ___ blocks to chart your song! (Clone the arrow left/right and the holding notes of said notes) Sprite Editing: Make 1 idle sprite, and 2 sprites of each direction Music Replacing: Add your music and then in the backdrop replace the play audio until done with play your audio until done  Project Link: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/492385371/
